string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Follow this link to a meditation page
We recommend Percy Jackson and the Olympians
Swimming is a great opportunity to have fun and exercise
Go for a walk with a friend or pet
Protein is great for building muscle
Basketball is a great way to have fun and get cardio in
These stretches will help with soreness and recovery
Seriously! Adequate rest is very important
Follow this link to the nearest Massage Envy
These local gyms all have a sauna you can use
The ice bath can help loosen muscles
Epsom Salt can also help you loosen your muscles
Use a baseball, tennis ball or follow this link to purchase your own roller
Dieting is important, but that does not mean you can not have pizza
